overview: We asked one hundred men what they would do if they had a million dollars, and they all gave the same answer, two chicks at the same time. Well, there's no more ifs, ands, or buts as we have given five lucky guys the chance to be double-teamed and double-steamed by the hottest babes you have ever laid your eyes on. With two tongues, four tits, and a pair of plush pink pussies all to yourself, there's no argument indeed that it's better to have two girls for every boy.
title: 2 Girls For Every Boy
